label: Caution Alert (Yellow)
description: For elevated pollution levels: caution residents and prepare barangay leaders for possible escalation.
content: EcoPulse Advisory (YELLOW): High pollution detected in your area. Limit outdoor exposure, especially for children/elderly. Use masks if needed.

label: Pollution Alert
description: Primary alert template used when air quality reaches critical levels.
content: EcoPulse Advisory Critical (RED): Hazardous air in your area. Stay indoors, and seal windows. Follow LGU instructions.
